descriptions:
['DescriptionThe chance to own a very private estate consisting of 2 villas on the tip of L frond. 
This is a unique estate  on the tip of L frond on the Palm Jumeirah consisting of 2 villas sitting in 20,0000 sq foot of gardens. 
The main 6 bedroom villa has just been completely refitted to a very high standard, by a Monegasque based designer, “Very You SAM”. All of the fixtures, fittings and furniture were shipped to Dubai from Europe and are of a European standard and quality. All items are bespoke and were designed and manufactured specifically for this villa. 
Next door, sharing the grounds, is the 5 bedroom guest villa with its own private pool.
Both villas come with fully equipped kitchens and are fully furnished to a very high standard.
The gardens are mature and beautifully landscaped. They  boast 2 extended pools, a sunken barbecue seating  area. The beachfront affords you dramatic  skyline views of the Dubai Eye and Dubai Marina. There are 3 maids rooms and private garaging for 4 cars.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionValco Properties are proud to offer this modified, upgraded and extended 2 story villa exclusively to the market.
One of the most sought after and in-demand types of a villa on the Palm, this 6,000 Built-Up sq. ft. property has been thoroughly upgraded inside and out to create a wonderful family home.
The relaxed atmosphere is immediately felt in the ground floor entrance hall which has been transformed into an open-plan reception/TV room that merges naturally into the main living and dining areas. The recently renovated kitchen is fully equipped with top of the line appliances and is suitably connected to a separate built-in laundry area, storage, maid’s room, and double garage with drivers room.
The 1st floor consists of 4 spacious bedrooms all of which are fitted with hardwood flooring, extra closet space, and modern en suite bathrooms. A massage room and a large outdoor terrace on the roof deck area with awe-inspiring views of the Ain Dubai Sea, beach and shoreline.
The outdoor area has been completely redone and professionally landscaped to create a sophisticated, yet family-friendly outdoor space that includes a temperature-controlled pool and Jacuzzi, gas fire pit, fire bowls, built-in BBQ area and extra storage on the beachside.
This is a rare opportunity to buy a unique property that has been carefully maintained Villa in the Palm.
Call your Palm Jumeirah Specialist Babak Taghizadeh at +971567770023
Please note that we do have multiple options available in the Fronds.']

['DescriptionFull Marina View | Emaar | Bonaire Tower | Exclusive
- Full Marina View
- Emaar Development
- 796 Sq. Ft. approx.
- 2 Bathrooms
- Balcony
- Vacant on Transfer
- Integrated Kitchen
- High Floor
- Agent: Alec Smith on +971585660877, RERA BRN No. 38513
- RERA Permit No. 2118311665
Exclusive with Allsopp and Allsopp, this is probably the most sought after 1 bedroom available and probably the best view available from any 1 bed in the whole of the Marina.
Comprises of entrance, integrated kitchen, lounge/diner with balcony, bedroom with fitted wardrobes and en suite, guest WC and utility/store room.
Floor to ceiling windows throughout the apartment allow for plenty of natural light and maximize the stunning views of the Dubai Marina.
Park Island is Emaar’s newest Marina Development and benefits from underground parking, Grassed BBQ area, gym, swimming pool and Squash courts.
Property Reference: SUP174677
Please call Alec Smith on +971585660877 for more information or to arrange a viewing.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are thrilled to offer to market this stunning 2 bedroom apartment in Al Arta, The Greens for a very exciting price of only AED 1,125,000.
This unit boasts the following key features
- Bright spacious living area
- 2 Large Bedrooms
- 2 Full Bathrooms
- Vacant
- Fully Fitted Open Style Kitchen
- Large Spacious Balcony
- Swimming Pool Views
- 1,489 sqft
- Perfect condition and well maintained
- Stunning Hotel Standard Swimming Pool
- Fully equipped gym
- Children’s Play Area
- Sales price - AED 1,125,000
Al Arta is a perfect example of the quality finishing by Emaar and the high standard of life offered in the Greens. The building is well located within the Greens area, being only a short walk form the Greens Village where you can avail of your everyday services like supermarkets and coffee shops. Close by is Barsha Heights, where you can find a variety of nice hotels and restaurants. You are also only a short drive from Dubai Marina, Dubai Downtown and Jumeirah’s famous golden beaches.
To reserve the unit please call Padraic now on +971504644029 or e-mail to padraic@phrealestate.ae']
